comment: Well my feeling is that due to health reasons and age I am prepared to risk it. However that doesnt mean I expect young people to take this potentially damaging vaccine to protect me or to travel etc. I am against any form of vaccine passport they dont have to be linked
amr:
# ::snt Well my feeling is that due to health reasons and age I am prepared to risk it. However that doesnt mean I expect young people to take this potentially damaging vaccine to protect me or to travel etc. I am against any form of vaccine passport they dont have to be linked
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (f / feel-02
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (p / prepare-02
                  :ARG1 ii
                  :ARG2 (r / risk-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG2 (ii2 / it))
                  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (a / and
                              :op1 (r2 / reason
                                    :mod (h / health))
                              :op2 (a2 / age-01
                                    :ARG1 ii)))))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (m2 / mean-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (t / that)
                  :ARG2 (e / expect-01
                        :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                        :ARG1 (t2 / take-01
                              :ARG0 (p2 / person
                                    :mod (y / young))
                              :ARG1 (v / vaccine
                                    :ARG0-of (d / damage-01
                                          :mod (p3 / potential))
                                    :mod (t3 / this))
                              :purpose (o / or
                                    :op1 (p4 / protect-01
                                          :ARG0 p2
                                          :ARG1 ii3)
                                    :op2 (t4 / travel-01
                                          :ARG0 p2)
                                    :op3 (e2 / et-cetera))))))
      :snt3 (o2 / oppose-01
            :ARG0 (ii4 / i)
            :ARG1 (p5 / passport
                  :mod (v2 / vaccine)
                  :mod (f2 / form
                        :mod (a3 / any))
                  :ARG1-of (l / link-01
                        :ARG2-of (o3 / obligate-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG1 (t5 / they))))))

comment: Never give in to something you know to be wrong, that's how they win
